title: The root schema
description: The root schema comprises the entire JSON document.

message-id.title: The message-id schema
message-id.description: This is used to uniquely identify devices.

json-web-token.title: The json-web-token schema
json-web-token.description: This is used authenticate a user.

aws-user-name.title: The aws-user-name schema
aws-user-name.description: The Cognito username for the person who is requesting the document add.

role-list.title: The role-list schema
role-list.description: This determines which actions user can perform.

anyOf.title: The first anyOf schema
anyOf.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

organizations-id.title: The organizations-id schema
organizations-id.description: This is a system generated id that is used to restrict access to customers data.

documents-link.title: The documents-link schema
documents-link.description: This is the URL of document to be processed.

documents-owner-key.title: The documents-owner-key schema
documents-owner-key.description: This is a system generated id(s) that is used to restrict access to micro-service data. This is the source table primary key field value.
